column5: Hey Guys,  Well we had a trip booked for a cottage next to lake joseph but haven't heard from the owner so I don't think it's going to go through.  It's disappointing when we both booked time off work and were planning a Thursday-Sunday trip for some pike.  Does anyone have any recommendations for 2 guys looking to rent a cottage & boat for a few nights?  We had initially planned this with a $500 budget and not sure where to look with such little time.  We're looking for a place around 2hrs-3hrs drive from the barrie area.  Perhaps North Bay would be a good place to start?  Sorry, we just started to get in to fishing this year and don't know all the good places to be planning trips.  Thanks, Gov

Definitely start checking out lodges on Nipissing -- for your budget and drive-time, I'm sure you could go have some fun in the West Arm...Lakair, West Nipissing Resort...would be where I would start....good luck!
